descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add
options.action: Add an email to an unsubscribe list

options.name: Delete
options.action: Delete an email from an unsubscribe list

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: ID of the campaign to unsubscribe the lead from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
campaignId.ai_hint: ID of the campaign to unsubscribe the lead from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

enrichId.name: enrichId
enrichId.description: ID of the enrichment to retrieve
enrichId.ai_hint: ID of the enrichment to retrieve

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: companyName
options.description: Company name of the lead to create

options.name: companyDomain
options.description: Company domain of the lead to create

options.name: deduplicate
options.description: Whether to do not insert if this email is already present in another campaign

options.name: firstName
options.description: First name of the lead to create

options.name: icebreaker
options.description: Icebreaker of the lead to create

options.name: jobTitle
options.description: Job title of the lead to create

options.name: lastName
options.description: Last name of the lead to create

options.name: linkedinEnrichment
options.description: Whether to run the LinkedIn enrichment

options.name: linkedinUrl
options.description: LinkedIn URL of the lead to create

options.name: phone
options.description: Phone number of the lead to create

options.name: picture
options.description: Picture URL of the lead to create

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

email.name: email
email.description: Email to delete from the unsubscribes
email.ai_hint: Email to delete from the unsubscribes

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'campaign' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getStats' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getStats' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDate'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getStats' THEN SHOW parameter 'endDate'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getStats' THEN SHOW parameter 'timezone'
IF resource == 'enrich' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'enrichId'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation == 'enrichLead' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation IN ["enrichLead", "enrichPerson"] THEN SHOW parameter 'findEmail'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation IN ["enrichLead", "enrichPerson"] THEN SHOW parameter 'verifyEmail'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation IN ["enrichLead", "enrichPerson"] THEN SHOW parameter 'linkedinEnrichment'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation IN ["enrichLead", "enrichPerson"] THEN SHOW parameter 'findPhone'
IF resource == 'enrich' AND operation == 'enrichPerson' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'lead' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'unsubscribe' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'unsubscribe' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'team' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'unsubscribe' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'unsubscribe' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'unsubscribe' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'unsubscribe' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'unsubscribe' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
